SELECT t_da_commodity.commodity_id as commodityId, t_da_commodity.commodity_name as commodityName, t_da_commodity.commodity_Description as commodityDescription, date_format(t_da_commodity.start_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate, date_format(t_da_commodity.end_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as endDate, t_da_commodity.created_by as createdBy, date_format(t_da_commodity.created_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as createdDate, t_da_commodity.lastupdated_by as lastupdatedBy, date_format(t_da_commodity.lastupdated_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as lastupdatedDate, t_da_commodity.commodity_price as commodityPrice, t_da_commodity.commodity_type as commodityType, t_da_commodity.active_flag as activeFlag, t_da_supplier.supplier_name as supplierName, t_da_supplier.supplier_contactname as supplierContactname, t_da_supplier.supplier_telephone as supplierTelephone, t_da_supplier.supplier_mobile as supplierMobile, t_da_supplier.supplier_address as supplierAddress, t_da_supplier.supplier_description as supplierDescription, t_da_user.user_email as userEmail, t_da_commodity.product_id as productId, t_da_product.category_id as categoryId, t_da_product.product_name as productName, t_da_category.category_name as categoryName, imageId FROM t_da_commodity left join t_da_product on t_da_product.product_id = t_da_commodity.product_id left join t_da_category on t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id left join t_da_user on t_da_commodity.user_id = t_da_user.user_id left join t_da_supplier on t_da_supplier.user_id = t_da_user.user_id left join ( select max(commodityimage_id) imageId, commodity_id from t_da_commodityimage group by commodity_id ) image on image.commodity_id = t_da_commodity.commodity_id WHERE t_da_commodity.commodity_id > 0
commodity_type = '$param.commodityType$'
commodity_name like '%$param.commodityName$%'
t_da_commodity.active_flag = '$param.activeFlag$'
t_da_product.product_name = '$param.productName$'
t_da_commodity.commodity_name
$orderByStatement$
LIMIT $first$, $pageSize$;

SELECT count(*) as total FROM t_da_commodity left join t_da_product on t_da_product.product_id = t_da_commodity.product_id left join t_da_category on t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id WHERE commodity_id > 0
commodity_type = '$param.commodityType$'
commodity_name like '%$param.commodityName$%'
t_da_product.product_name = '$param.productName$'
t_da_commodity.active_flag = '$param.activeFlag$'
